name: Shooty Mug
description:
Shoot flames with water balloons to raise your score but be fast because your score is constantly decreasing!

Game Name is an arena shooter. you play as a little hot cocoa mug looking to stay warm. Shoot flames with water balloons to increase your heat score, but be fast because your heat is constantly diminishing. Don't let a flame touch you or you will become too hot and burn. 

your heat score maxes out at 1475, go any hotter than that and you will become too hot and burn up. If your heat score hits 0 you become too cold and freeze.

Controls

wasd or arrow keys to move

mouse to turn around

left click to shoot.

Other

no music, ran out of jam time.
